website_summaries.verdict: The HP 20-c010 isn't the most powerful all-in-one desktop out there, but for $350, it's entirely capable of handling the basics.
cons: 1,600-by-900-resolution screen can look a bit grainy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife to replace an eight-year-old machine before the HD crapped out. Setup was easy if time consuming to get all the software updates, etc., but totally painless and without a hitch. Everything worked and it's nice to have a smaller footprint on the desk. I like it and she likes it and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Welch

customer_reviews.title: This computer is just like brand new
customer_reviews.text: This computer is just like brand new! It performs better than expected and I love the large screen with vibrant colors. This is my first all-in-one and I love the fact that I can move it from room to room easily. I also like that it is white--HP really does have a wide variety of colors and choices. I like their customer service as well. I rated this deal 4 stars because I had to do a TON of updates that took hours to complete and even went into the following day. OVERALL A GOOD DEAL. I recommend buying a refurbished computer on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MJade

customer_reviews.title: The good news: The quality of the display is remarkable
customer_reviews.text: The good news: The quality of the display is remarkable. It takes up very little space. It is VERY fast. The quality of the on-board speakers is very good. Now, for the other news....because I went from Windows 7 to Windows 10 there were all kinds of issues that I did not have the experience to remedy. I strongly recommend the purchase of the HP Smart Friend Service. It's $15.00/month and worth every penny of it. Having a problem with the 'puter? Just call them and they go into your machine and fix it. They are very good at what they do and there is no issue too big or too small. Sincerely, Robert
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far no problems...It arrived on time....I've used for 3 months now and I'm sad to say I'm disappointed. Poor performance...pages load slowly streaming video terrible...many pauses if it loads at all... graphics are so so.. If I could return it I would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: The computer is brand new, so it has nothing downloaded on it that would slow it down. From day one the computer has been running just as slow as the 10 year old computer it replaced. It has nothing to do with the internet connection because it's slow before I even log on to the internet. The only reason it's getting 2 stars is because it's a very nice looking computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Grice

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Machine
customer_reviews.text: Like this machine except for one thing. It makes very noticeable noises. It has a high pitched hum that can be heard across the room. Also, the plastic housing also makes a rattling noise. If you want a quiet machine, this is NOT the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: D.Everett

customer_reviews.title: A little buzz
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this all in one. Very clean lines on my glass desk. It doesn't take up much room. Only issue is a little buzz sound once and awhile. I have to adjust the monitor, tilt it forward or back to make it stop. if it wasn't for that I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Works Good Enough tor Us
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Serves is purpose for homework and online games. My son likes it a lot. Was a great choice for a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: BayBee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how big it is. It use it mostly for editing in photoshop.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer! Out of box and using it for work within an hour. I do wish it had a CD player. Only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Rexanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a great computer overall but the biggest dislike we have for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer overall but the biggest dislike we have for it is the internal disc drive. The darn thing is absurdly loud.
customer_reviews.author: Stayfrosty87

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these computer and 1 did not work.

customer_reviews.title: Good but the first one didt work
customer_reviews.text: I got this because i return the first pone i got because the cd burner didt work.. This pone work Just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Set up for my mother's first business center. She loves it and I love the east set up and usability. Loves just like the picture...and works too

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Sleek, Goes great in living space.
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase, nice computer for the price and not lost of bloat software,

customer_reviews.title: All around good value in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I like the touch screen and it is very easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, it's for my daughter for school and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice 2nd Computer for office setting, Good buy also! Thanks for your service!

customer_reviews.title: HP 24  TOUCHSCREEN IS  FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I HAD A PAVILION 23 FOR SEVERAL YEARS AND WAS VERY HAPPY. THIS PAVILION 24 HAS WINDOWS 10 AND IS JUST SUPERB. I HAVE RECOMMENDED IT TO ALL MY FRIENDS WITH PROBLEM COMPUTERS.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great computer! I use it for work and it is great!

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price and looks!
customer_reviews.text: Good computer for the price. Does all the jobs right. Looks really great on desk top . Very slim . In a very quiet room the machine makes a little bit noice when it is running. (Fan like noice) In general great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She picked it out and is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 year old granddaughter. She picked it out and is very happy with it. Delivery was exceptional.

customer_reviews.title: All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. It's really a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patty C.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I've been satisfied with the computer so far. The only thing I wish was that they would have installed the cdr in an easier place.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Morrison

customer_reviews.title: a good computer
customer_reviews.text: It is a little slow and noisy and I am still learning windows 10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer. Just wish it came with a wireless mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great PC, just packaging was a bit loose, no instructions or manual included
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Computer!! Very fast!! Only thing I wished I would have purchased the touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any use
customer_reviews.text: Great look, very sleek. Doesn't take up a lot of unnecessary space. We replaced the mouse with a cordless one that we already had. We will be doing the same with the keyboard at some point. Only because I'm used to using a bigger keyboard at work. other than those very small things, we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HP 24GO1623.8 ALL IN 1 COMPUTER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE MONITOR ON THIS COMPUTER.PICTURE IS CLEAR.SET UP WAS A BREEZE.THE KEYBOARD IS EASILY READ AND YOU DONT HAVE TO PRESS VERY HARD TO USE KEYS.COMPUTER IS FAST AND RELIABLE. I WOULD DEFINITELY BUY THIS IF YOU ARE A STUDENT OR PARENT
customer_reviews.author: jazabe;;313

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Price, Limited Functionality
customer_reviews.text: If you basically only need to use this for minimal purposes then it's a great option due to price. We returned it after no IT help, either through Amazon of my wife's job could get it to run anything off of Citrix. It ran Citrix, but nothing through it. Days wasted trying. This was why we bought it and so obviously, this is why we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive computer!
customer_reviews.text: It is slow, it is. I'm not very technologically savvy so I don't know if there is a solution to that, but its still a great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Was good for one use then I restarted it and it wouldn't get past the loading screen. Called hp service number and still couldn't get it to work! Very disappointed! The one time I used it though I did notice it was quite slow
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dickrell

customer_reviews.title: Egg shell white
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to use all of the features but so far I really loveit. Amazon video and DVD's and fast searching is great. Don't use all the microsoft programs because I prefer others even though Microsoft is sorta pushy. Mcafree has me a little confused, is it included or is it a one month trial? Have to find out the hard way I guess. Love the egg shell white color!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V.

customer_reviews.title: I have always favored HP products, I have bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always favored HP products, I have bought other products from time to time, `but I always wind up coming back to HP.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer and it arrived at the time it was suppose to.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely slow! Will not process anything and locks up. I purchased to pay bills only, no streaming, photos, or storage used. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has met all of my expectation and more. Thank you so much sincerely Yvonne
customer_reviews.author: yvonne  serrano

customer_reviews.title: Computer works very well the only thing I dislike about the computer is where the power button is ...
customer_reviews.text: Computer works very well the only thing I dislike about the computer is where the power button is located and the SD drive there on the bottom of the PC
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing is really good and fast. For the money it meets what we need
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Knight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my new computer !!! Thank you ..And it got here on time !! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 24hrs before hanging up. "Loss of internet connection," although my iMac connection was fine! A cold boot gave an endless message (for hours) to do with "Opening . . . do not disconnect," an error noted on the internet that was not uncommon among frustrated buyers, and came with no offered solutions. I spoke to an HP "tech," whose unhesitating response to my one-sentence complaint was, "Send it back to Amazon. Have a nice day" Amazon (bless them) accepted the return without question.
customer_reviews.author: J Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less that a month and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no instructions in box, not IT sav vy but ...
customer_reviews.text: no instructions in box, not IT sav vy but got it together, does make a humming sound which i dont care for. but you get what you pay for i found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this computer
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. Very happy with this computer. It fits my needs and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Donahue

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: SO SLOW!!! Got it for business purposes to simply run a cloud POS off of and it can't even handle that. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hard drive failed already
customer_reviews.text: have had trouble with it- I asked to return it but Amazon supervisor has not responded
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid to buy this cheap product if you really need to work with computer.
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth the money you pay. This is more like the wireless system connect and disconnect or maybe the system freeze but in any case in the worse time when you almost done with a project the system hang and it takes 20 minutes to again restart it !!! when your client seating in front of you this is the worse scenario.
customer_reviews.author: behroz

customer_reviews.title: Not made very well.
customer_reviews.text: Have had computer 3 weeks & had to call HP because a cd I put into the optical drive did not hold & fell into the computer. The HP representative told us how to get the back off to retrieve cd. Machine is the slowest computer I have ever owned & for me, I do not like windows 10 at all. Much prefer windows 7 or vista.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Computer is a piece shit
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attached any data from a scan. In other work it ain't worth s***
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: don't like the new windows system hard to find things.
customer_reviews.author: quilterbynight49

customer_reviews.title: Pins and needles....
customer_reviews.text: K- feeling nervous now after that 1st review, mine will be here Tuesday. I'll keep ya'll posted. Update: Just got it today. It's running great! I'm really enjoying it. And BTW. It comes with a keyboard and mouse. It doesn't really say in the description. It's likely just assumed because of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nymueh

customer_reviews.title: Spectacularly bad investment
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review anything unless it is spectacularly good or bad. This hunk o' junk falls into the bad category. Yep it's really pretty which is great because you will be spending lots of time looking at it while you wait for something, anything at all to happen (see photo). Just logging in can take up to five minutes. The biggest waste of money I have ever spent. Don't waste yours too.
customer_reviews.author: Living it up

product_meta.title: HP 24-g016 23.8" All-In-One Desktop (Intel Pentium J3710, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home)
product_meta.description: Style:23.8 Inch Non-Touch| Size:Pentium | 8 GB RAM | 1 TB HDDRedesigned. Reliable. Ready for you. Whether your family is looking to surf, stream or tackle that NEXT big assignment, this budget friendly All-in-One has been redesigned to give everyone what they need.
feature_bullets: 23.8" diagonal widescreen FHD IPS wled-backlit Display (1920 x 1080)
